description: This file defines API endpoints for managing a test execution queue in a testing infrastructure. It provides routes for listing queued test cases, adding new cases to the queue, and removing cases from the queue, utilizing FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and custom services.

methods.name: get_queue( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve the current test execution queue, returning a list of queued test cases.

methods.name: add_to_queue( queue_data: QueueAddRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to add one or multiple test cases to the execution queue, returning a confirmation with the added items.

methods.name: remove_from_queue( case_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a specific test case from the queue by its ID.

ctags.name: add_to_queue
ctags.signature: ( queue_data: QueueAddRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: get_queue
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: remove_from_queue
ctags.signature: ( case_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
